title: Increase of OH radical yields due to the decomposition of hydrogen peroxide by gold nanoparticles under X-ray irradiation
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,9509-9513
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00208C, Paper

Yu Okazaki, Tamon Kusumoto, Stephane Roux, Ryoichi Hirayama, Michel Fromm, Rana Bazzi, Satoshi Kodaira, Jun Kataoka
We elucidate the decomposition mechanism of hydrogen peroxide, which is formed by water radiolysis, by gold nanoparticles (GNPs) under X-ray irradiation.
